bug.question: I have six legs and love to crawl. I make honey for one and all. What am I?
I build hills of dirt and carry food to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🌿 I can often be found in your backyard.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots on my back.

bug.question: I jump very high and eat plants. I am green.

hints.text: 🟢 I blend in with the grass.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then get wings and can fly.
I have long legs and hide in dark places. Some people think I am scary.

hints.text: 🕳️ I like to hide in corners.

bug.question: I buzz around lights at night and have clear wings.

hints.text: 🌙 I am attracted to light sources.
💡 I am a type of fly.
🌃 You can often find me outside your window.

bug.question: I live in water when I'm young and fly around when I'm older. I have big eyes.

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live near ponds and streams.

bug.question: I bite and drink blood. I am very small and can be annoying.

hints.text: 🌙 I am active at dusk and dawn.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and light up the night sky.

hints.text: ✨ I produce light using a chemical reaction.
🌃 I am most active during summer evenings.
💡 I use my light to attract a mate.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day, but I disappear when night comes to play. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I give light and warmth to the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am round and I spin, I am your home within. I have land and water, where you can swim. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ You can find countries on me.
💧 I am mostly covered in blue.

cosmos.question: I am bright at night, sometimes round, sometimes a crescent. I orbit the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 People sometimes say I am made of this.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, much bigger than the Earth, with a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 The Great Red Spot is a storm on me.

cosmos.question: I'm made of icy dust and rock, with a bright tail when I get close to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I sometimes appear in the sky.
✨ My tail always points away from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a ringed planet, famous for my beautiful circles made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 My rings are made of ice.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ You can find me using a star chart.
🔭 Some of the most famous are The Big Dipper and Orion.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky body orbiting the sun. I'm too small to be a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I can be found in a belt.
👨‍🚀 Some people want to mine me.

cosmos.question: I'm the force that keeps the planets orbiting the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree is an example of me.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system lives inside of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I look like a milky band across the sky.
💫 I have a supermassive black hole at my center.
